desc: A sustained healer that works best from range.

spells.name: Guardian Sprite
spells.desc: Applies a Damage Shield to target ally or yourself for up to 1000 damage and increases Bonus Healing Received by 50% over 6s.

spells.name: Purification
spells.desc: Cleanses and makes target ally or yourself immune to Ailment effects for 9s.

spells.name: Transcendent Blast
spells.desc: Transference of accumulated power into a magical blast dealing 150/300/550/900/1350/1900 damage to target enemy based on Transcendent Blast stacks.
spells.desc2: Transcendent Blast stacks accrue every 400/600/1200/2200/3600/5400 healing done and applied Damage Shield consumption. Stacks consumed on use.
spells.addInfo: Consumes Transcendent Blast stacks to deal instant damage to a target enemy. Current stack count can be seen above and to the left of your health bar.

spells.name: Heal
spells.desc: Instantly heals target ally or yourself for 1500 Health.

spells.name: Mending Wave
spells.desc: Heals yourself and all allies in a line for 400 Health.

desc: Manipulate time to slow groups of enemies, both defending and enabling your team.

spells.name: Haste
spells.desc: Applies a 20% Haste, Bonus Damage, and Bonus Healing to target ally and yourself for 8s.

spells.name: Temporal Field
spells.desc: Create a centralized area of time manipulation, applying a 40% Slow to all enemy targets within the area for up to 10s. Buff and Debuff durations are altered.

spells.name: Chronoleap
spells.desc: Leaps into the future, avoiding damage for up to 4s and cleansing Aliment effects.

spells.name: Cease Continuum
spells.desc: All enemies and projectiles are brought to a near complete stop for 20s. Buff and Debuff durations are altered.
spells.desc2: Passive: All Ultimate Accrual rates are reduced by 50%.

spells.name: Stasis Beam
spells.desc: Channels a beam for up to 10s, dealing 55-1100 damage and stacking a 12% slow every 0.5s to a maximum of 60%. Buff and Debuff durations are altered.

desc: Anticipate burst damage and positioning to protect your allies and create areas of denial.

spells.name: Meteor
spells.desc: Summons a meteor at target location dealing 280 fire damage and moderate impact, and applying burn to all enemies in an area. Burn deals 250 fire damage plus 100 fire damage per additional stack over 10s.

spells.name: Aqueous Globe
spells.desc: Summons a dome at target location which blocks incoming projectiles and increases Damage Resistance of allies inside by 20%. Lasts 20s.

spells.name: Quake
spells.desc: Summons an earthquake at target location which deals 100 damage and an additional 180 damage and medium impact over 10s in an area.

spells.name: Elemental Quintessence
spells.desc: Revives and heals all nearby allies for 650 health, plus 750 health over 6s.

spells.name: Glacial Armor
spells.desc: Applies a Damage Shield to target ally or yourself for up to 1000 damage over 5s. Cooldown is reduced by 1s for every 65 damage soaked.

desc: A mid-range Assassin that uses demonic artifacts to ensnare, entrap, and eradicate the enemy.

spells.name: Marked Shot
spells.desc: Deal 250 damage to target enemy and decrease their Damage Resistance by 20% for 6s

spells.name: Binding Circle
spells.desc: Create a trap at your location, once triggered it deals 150 damage and applies Root to all enemies until the trap fades. Lasts 6s. Breaches cannot be placed on Binding Circle.

spells.name: Banishing Relic
spells.desc: Deal 225 damage, Interrupt and Banish target Strong or Elite enemy for 10s. Banish freezes the NPC, but prevents players from attacking it. Cannot be used on Possessed targets. Can be ended early by activating the spell a second time

spells.name: Siphoning Skull
spells.desc: Channels a beam for up to 8s, applying Stun and dealing 335 damage to target enemy. Converts 50% of the damage dealt to restore health.

spells.name: Sticky Grenade
spells.desc: Propel a grenade that will stick to anything it hits. After being stuck, the grenade will explode after 0.5s, dealing 350 damage to all enemies in the area.

desc: Prevent Veil Demons from possessing and empowering your enemies as an Exorcist. Then execute your weakened enemies with explosive munitions and combat-ready talismans.

spells.name: Hallowed Spike
spells.desc: Deals 50 damage and curses the target enemy with a 25% Slow and 2 stacks of bleed. Bleed deals 280 bleeding damage plus 80 bleeding damage per additional stack over 8s.

spells.name: Confound
spells.desc: Deal 80 damage and Interrupt target enemy.

spells.name: Explosive Shell
spells.desc: Deals 500 damage and very high impact to all enemies hit. Enemies affected by Expel take an additional 500 damage.

spells.name: Exilium Daemonium
spells.desc: Deals 225, very high impact and applies Expel to all enemies for 5s. Expel forces the target to be de-possessed and prevents re-possession.

spells.name: Exorcism
spells.desc: Deals 200 and moderate impact to all enemies hit. Also applies Expel for 5s if target is possessed. Expel forces the target to be de-possessed and prevents re-possession.

desc: A short ranged fighter that uses occultist powers to summon and borrow demonic powers.

spells.name: Incendiary Shots
spells.desc: Shoot a spread of shots, each dealing 115 fire damage.

spells.name: Hellfire
spells.desc: You draw upon the power in your artifact to create an aura, dealing 100 fire damage and removing Buffs every 1s second from all enemies nearby. Lasts 5s.

spells.name: Projectile Ward
spells.desc: Applies a buff that reduces incoming ranged damage to 0%, instead dealing that damage back to the caster. Lasts 6s.

spells.name: Healing Pact
spells.desc: Heals nearby allies for 1000.

spells.name: Tar Jar
spells.desc: Deals 75 damage to a target area, applying Tar and a 20% Slow for 15s. Tar increases your Impact Resistance to attacks from the target. Fire damage will ignite the target, applying Burning Tar.

desc: Lock down one strong enemy at a time with unrivaled, high impact aerial combat.

spells.name: Auros Grasp
spells.desc: Pulls target enemy to you.

spells.name: Cyclone Blade
spells.desc: Deals 510 damage and very high impact over 2.5s.

spells.name: Downburst
spells.desc: Slams an enemy, dealing 375 damage. Grounded targets are launched into the air, while aerial targets are relaunched into the air.

spells.name: Gladiator's Wrath
spells.desc: Pulls and repeatedly slams target enemy dealing up to 2000 damage over 6.15s.

spells.name: Zephyr Strike
spells.desc: Launches you and target enemy into the air. Enemy receives 90 damage and is vulnerable to follow up aerial attacks.
spells.desc2: Passive: Light Impact Resistance, +15% Bonus Basic Attack Damage, +1 Dodge
spells.addInfo: While engaged in Aerial Combat: +75% Damage Resistance, Heavy Impact Resistance

desc: Hard hitting spells which bolster your survivability when attacking multiple enemies at once.

spells.name: Cleave
spells.desc: A broad swing which deals 100-300 damage to enemies based on distance, and an additional 100-500 damage to Taunted targets.

spells.name: Arcane Charge
spells.desc: Charge to and deal 200 damage and high impact to target enemy.

spells.name: War Cry
spells.desc: Taunts nearby enemies, forcing them to attack the caster for 8s.

spells.name: Titan's Fist
spells.desc: Slams weapon into ground, delivering 800 damage and extreme impact to all enemies in front of you. Refunds 75% of your ultimate Progress if no enemies are hit.
spells.desc2: Passive: All Ultimate Accrual Rates are increased by 50%

spells.name: Mana Strike
spells.desc: Slams weapon into the ground delivering 125 damage to nearby enemies, while granting you a stacking Damage Shield equal to 10% of max Health per enemy hit, up to 50% of your max Health. Lasts 8s.
spells.desc2: Passive: Heavy Impact Resistance, +750 Health, +1 Dodge

desc: Defend your allies and redirect the damage absorbed back at your enemies. Well-timed defensive spells are the key to success.

spells.name: Guard
spells.desc: Guard target ally so long as distance between you and ally is <10m. Target gains 80% Damage Resistance. You take 75% of the mitigated damage.

spells.name: Intervene
spells.desc: Rush to your target ally, dealing 80 damage and impulsing nearby enemies away on arrival.

spells.name: Bastard Cleave
spells.desc: A broad swing dealing 100 damage, or 135/240/415/660/975/1360 damage based on the number of Bastard Cleave buff stacks, plus 50% Lifesteal if you have 2 or more stacks of Bastard Cleave. A Bastard Cleave stack is accrued after taking 200/250/400/650/1000/1450 damage. All stacks are consumed on use.

spells.name: Strike of the Aegis
spells.desc: Pulls enemies over 5s, then deals 875 damage and high impact to all nearby enemies. You have 90% Damage Resistance for duration.

spells.name: Resolute Block
spells.desc: Channels a reactive block, converting up to 1,000 of incoming damage into health for 2s.
spells.desc2: Passive: Heavy Impact Resistance, +750 Health, +1 Dodge
spells.addInfo: Hero is invulnerable and converts 1,000 points of incoming damage into health for the duration.

desc: Encapsulate your soul to hide your health pool and deliver unrivaled damage when executed perfectly.

spells.name: Overwhelming Power
spells.desc: Your power emanates as a violent aura, dealing 50 damage per second to all enemies nearby and giving you Heavy Impact Resistance for 6s Usable during CC.

spells.name: Crippling Rake
spells.desc: Send out dark energy, delivering 550 damage and apply a debuff to enemies that cause the next damage you deal from a spell to do 25% more damage. Does not include auras. The debuff lasts 15s.

spells.name: Phylactery
spells.desc: Places a Phylactery imbued with your soul, making your body immune to damage. Damage received by the Phylactery will be reflected in your health pool. If the Phylactery is destroyed you are left with minimal health. Lasts until destroyed or activate again to remove.

spells.name: Arcane Siphon
spells.desc: Silence all enemies nearby for 10s, and receive charges of a Bonus Damage buff based on the number and rank of enemies hit. Each charged grants a 25% Bonus Damage on the following spell.

spells.name: Death Touch
spells.desc: Target an enemy and start building up power. Hold to power up even further. Upon release, teleport to the target, Stun them and deal 300 damage plus an additional 220 damage for every second power was built up.
spells.desc2: Passive: Light Impact Resistance, +15% Bonus Basic Attack Damage, +1 Dodge

desc: Wield Necromantic spells to summon undead. Direct them to attack enemies or bolster allies.

spells.name: Command Minion
spells.desc: Command your minion allies to attack target enemy. They will continue to attack target until it is defeated, they can no longer reach it, or are commanded otherwise. Enemies you defeat are turned into an Undead Shamble minion. You can have up to three Shamblers active at once in this way. They last until they are defeated.
spells.desc2: Shambler Sacrifice Effect - explodes dealing 300 damage to nearby enemies.

spells.name: Sacrifice Minion
spells.desc: Sacrifice target minion. Gain 500 health and trigger minion's sacrifice effect. Usable during CC.

spells.name: Haunting Wraiths
spells.desc: Summons several wraiths that rush forward in a frenzy, delivering 175 damage to enemies and a Damage Shield for up to 400 damage to allies before fading back behind the Veil.

spells.name: Raise Dead
spells.desc: Summon 8 Undead Shambler minions. They last 20s or until defeated.

spells.name: Frenzied Shambler
spells.desc: Summon a shambler that will travel toward an enemy target. Upon arrival, the shambler will explode dealing 300 damage and high impact.
